item.title: Making the Most of Bit Arrays
item.description: Gleam has a special piece of syntax that most other languages don't: Bit arrays. They are extremely powerful, but unfortunately the documentation is a little sparse.

item.title: Test Timeouts in Gleam
item.description: By default, Gleam tests come with a timeout of 5 seconds. It's not as easy as you might think to remove it.
